description: Podman - daemonless container engine for OCI containers

common_errors.regex: (?i)image.*not known|unable to find|no such image|manifest unknown
common_errors.cause: Specified image does not exist locally or in configured registries
common_errors.solution: Verify image name, add registry prefix (docker.io/), check registries.conf

common_errors.cause: Rootless podman user namespace setup failed
common_errors.solution: Configure /etc/subuid and /etc/subgid for user, run 'podman system migrate'
Reset storage with 'podman system reset', check storage.conf, verify filesystem supports overlayfs
Check network config in /etc/cni/net.d/, run 'podman network ls' and recreate network

common_errors.cause: Cannot bind to requested port (privilege or conflict)
common_errors.solution: Use ports > 1024 for rootless, or set net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start=0
Run 'podman login' with credentials, check auth.json in XDG_RUNTIME_DIR
Check conmon is installed, verify OCI runtime (crun/runc) is working

common_errors.cause: Volume mount failed due to path or permissions
common_errors.solution: Use :Z or :z suffix for SELinux, verify paths exist, check rootless volume locations

common_errors.cause: Failed to create pod or infra container
common_errors.solution: Check pod name is unique, verify resources available, review pod spec

common_errors.cause: Error with systemd unit generation or quadlet
common_errors.solution: Check unit file syntax, verify podman version supports feature, review journalctl logs
